casebody.data:
No. 10-680. Carol Howes, Warden, Petitioner v. Randall Lee Fields. 562 U.S. 1199, 131 S. Ct. 1047,

178 L. Ed. 2d 862,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 960. January 24, 2011.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 617 F.3d 813.
